roleset.name: cf report, putting up
roleset.note: POST-V NOTES: Frames file for 'post' based on survey of initial sentences of big corpusand comparison with 'report' (from post.01-v)
POST-N NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01. Comparison to verb entry post.01, which maps to VN class 11.1; no relevant FN frame. (from post.01-n)
POSTING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, post.01. No VNcls. (from posting.01-n)

example.name: Arg0 rel Arg1
example.text: Cray posted a profit of $5.9 million.

example.name: Arg0 rel ArgM-TMP Arg2-to
example.text: John posts frequently to the newsgroups.

example.name: all args
example.text: A few days ago I saw her post to Facebook that her ex (who left her for another girl and had a baby by her during this) was saying her baby...

example.name: all args
example.text: I'm a little dismayed at the comment made about Peter Torks' cancer and his posting it on Facebook.

example.name: reporting: args 0, 1
example.text: What does their posting a profit have to do with the writers strike?

roleset.name: tell someone news as it comes in
roleset.note: POST-V NOTES: Based on BOLT SMS data. Comparison to update.02. Update.02 is a member of VN class tell-37.2. Framed by Katie. (from post.02-v)
